00035   length = 0.0;

00042 void Ph::Clear(void) {
00043   hits.clear();
00044   nhits = 0;
00045   length = 0.0;

00048 void Ph::addHit(TVector3 hit) {
00049   hits.push_back(hit);
00050   nhits++;
00051 }
00052 
00053 int Ph::getHitSize(void) {return hits.size();}
00054 
00055 TVector3 Ph::getHit(int nh) {return hits[nh];}

00057 MCOpticalEvent::MCOpticalEvent() {
00058 
00059   NRun = 0;
00060   NEvent = 0;
00061   Time = 0;
00062   N1=0;
00063   N2=0;
00064   S1=0;
00065   S2=0;
00066   T1 = 0.0;
00067   T2 = 0.0;
00068 
00069   PartID.clear();
00070   Energy.clear();
00071   pos.clear();
00072   pTime.clear();
00073 
00074   first_t1 = false;
00075   first_t2 = false;
00076 
00077   if (fgPhotons1 == 0) fgPhotons1 = new TClonesArray("Ph", 7000);
00078   else fgPhotons1->Clear();
00079   Photons1 = fgPhotons1;
00080 
00081   if (fgPMHits1 == 0) fgPMHits1 = new TClonesArray("PMHit", 7000);
00082   else fgPMHits1->Clear();
00083   PMHits1 = fgPMHits1;
00084 
00085   if (fgPhotons2 == 0) fgPhotons2 = new TClonesArray("Ph", 7000);
00086   else fgPhotons2->Clear();
00087   Photons2 = fgPhotons2;
00088 
00089   if (fgPMHits2 == 0) fgPMHits2 = new TClonesArray("PMHit", 7000);
00090   else fgPMHits2->Clear();
00091   PMHits2 = fgPMHits2;
00092 
00093 }

00095 MCOpticalEvent::~MCOpticalEvent() {
00096    Clear();

00099 void MCOpticalEvent::Clear(void) {
00100 
00101   Ph *ph1;
00102   Ph *ph2;
00103 
00104   NRun = 0;
00105   NEvent = 0;
00106   Time = 0;
00107   N1=0;
00108   N2=0;
00109   S1=0;
00110   S2=0;
00111   T1 = 0.0;
00112   T2 = 0.0;
00113 
00114   PartID.clear();
00115   Energy.clear();
00116   pos.clear();
00117   pTime.clear();
00118 
00119   first_t1 = false;
00120   first_t2 = false;
00121 
00122   if(fgPhotons1 != 0) {
00123     for(int i=0; i<fgPhotons1->GetEntries(); i++) {
00124       ph1 = (Ph*) fgPhotons1->At(i);
00125       ph1->Clear();
00126     }
00127     fgPhotons1->Clear();
00128   }
00129 
00130   if(fgPhotons2 != 0) {
00131     for(int i=0; i<fgPhotons2->GetEntries(); i++) {
00132       ph2 = (Ph*) fgPhotons2->At(i);
00133       ph2->Clear();
00134     }
00135     fgPhotons2->Clear();
00136   }
00137 
00138   if(fgPMHits1 != 0) fgPMHits1->Clear();
00139 
00140   if(fgPMHits2 != 0) fgPMHits2->Clear();
00141 
00142 }
00143 
00144 void MCOpticalEvent::addPh(int ii, Ph *ray) {
00145 
00146   int i;
00147 
00148   if(ii==1) {
00149     i = fgPhotons1->GetLast() + 1;
00150     new((*fgPhotons1)[i]) Ph(*ray);
00151     N1++;
00152   } else {
00153     i = fgPhotons2->GetLast() + 1;
00154     new((*fgPhotons2)[i]) Ph(*ray);
00155     N2++;
00156   }
00157 
00158 }
00159 
00160 void MCOpticalEvent::addPMHit(int ii, PMHit *shit) {
00161 
00162   int i;
00163 
00164   if(ii==1) {
00165     i = fgPMHits1->GetLast() + 1;
00166     new((*fgPMHits1)[i]) PMHit(*shit);
00167     S1++;
00168     if(!first_t1) {
00169       T1 = shit->time; 
00170       first_t1 = true;
00171     } else {
00172       if((shit->time < T1) && (shit->time > 0.0)) T1=shit->time;
00173     }
00174   } else {
00175     i = fgPMHits2->GetLast() + 1;
00176     new((*fgPMHits2)[i]) PMHit(*shit);
00177     S2++;
00178     if(!first_t2) {
00179       T2 = shit->time; 
00180       first_t2 = true;
00181     } else {
00182       if((shit->time < T2) && (shit->time > 0.0)) T2=shit->time;
00183     }
00184   }
00185 
00186 }
00187 
00188 void MCOpticalEvent::addPMHit(int ii, TVector3 *p, TVector3 *d, TVector3 *r, double w, double t, int index, int itx) {
00189 
00190   int i;
00191   PMHit stored_hit;
00192 
00193   stored_hit.pos = *p;
00194   stored_hit.dir = *d;
00195   stored_hit.pol = *r;
00196   stored_hit.wavelength = w;
00197   stored_hit.detector_index = index;
00198   stored_hit.interaction = itx;
00199   stored_hit.time = t;
00200 
00201   if(ii==1) {
00202     i = fgPMHits1->GetLast() + 1;
00203     new((*fgPMHits1)[i]) PMHit(stored_hit);
00204     S1++;
00205     if(!first_t1) {
00206       T1 = stored_hit.time; 
00207       first_t1 = true;
00208     } else {
00209       if((stored_hit.time < T1) && (stored_hit.time > 0.0)) T1=stored_hit.time;
00210     }
00211   } else {
00212     i = fgPMHits2->GetLast() + 1;
00213     new((*fgPMHits2)[i]) PMHit(stored_hit);
00214     S2++;
00215     if(!first_t2) {
00216       T2 = stored_hit.time; 
00217       first_t2 = true;
00218     } else {
00219       if((stored_hit.time < T2) && (stored_hit.time > 0.0)) T2=stored_hit.time;
00220     }
00221   }
00222 
00223 }

00225 TClonesArray *MCOpticalEvent::getPhPointer(int i) {
00226   return (i==1) ? fgPhotons1 : fgPhotons2;
00227 }
00228 
00229 TClonesArray *MCOpticalEvent::getPMHitsPointer(int i) {
